activities.name: Therme București Wellness Day
activities.description: Float in mineral pools, try themed saunas and Aufguss rituals, and lounge under tropical palms at Europe's largest thermal complex. Three zones—Galaxy, The Palm, and Elysium—offer something for families and adults-only relaxation. Prebook online, bring swimwear, and plan for at least half a day to sample pools, slides and spa treatments.

activities.name: Peleș Castle Guided Visit
activities.description: Explore Romania's royal summer residence, a Neo-Renaissance jewel with ornate interiors, armory, and art collections. Join a guided tour to access multiple floors and learn about King Carol I. Check seasonal hours—castle is closed Mondays and Tuesdays most of the year.

activities.name: Bran Castle (Dracula's Castle) Visit
activities.description: Wander the corridors and courtyards of the 14th-century Bran Castle, famous for its Dracula legend and royal collection. Expect narrow stairways, views of the surrounding hills, and seasonal events. Mondays open later; last admission varies by season.

activities.name: Brașov Old Town Walking Tour
activities.description: Stroll medieval Brașov with a local guide: Council Square, Black Church, Rope Street, and old city walls. Hear tales of Saxon merchants and Dracula legends while discovering viewpoints and photo spots around the citadel.

activities.name: Skiing in Poiana Brașov
activities.description: Romania's top ski resort offers groomed pistes on Postăvaru Mountain, modern lifts, and multiple ski schools. Book lessons and rentals in the resort and plan around lift pass options. Great for beginners through intermediates.

activities.name: Danube Delta Boat Safari from Tulcea
activities.description: Glide through narrow channels and lakes with a licensed skipper to spot pelicans, herons, and reed islands in Europe's largest wetland. Depart from Tulcea's Port Aval; choose group or private itineraries between April and October.

activities.name: Wine Tasting in Dealu Mare
activities.description: Meet winemakers in Romania's flagship red-wine region. Tour vineyards and cellars before guided tastings of Fetească Neagră, Merlot, and blends. Several estates welcome visitors by appointment and offer terrace tastings with valley views.

activities.name: Transfăgărășan Scenic Day Tour
activities.description: Ride Romania's legendary alpine road past viaducts, tunnels and glacial lakes. Most tours run seasonally when the high pass is open, with stops at Bâlea Lake and viewpoints for photos. Weather can change quickly at altitude.

activities.name: Turda Salt Mine Underground Park
activities.description: Descend 120 meters into spectacular salt chambers with a subterranean lake, Ferris wheel, and family attractions. Book tickets online or on-site; allocate 1.5–2 hours and dress for cool underground temperatures year-round.

activities.name: Dimitrie Gusti National Village Museum
activities.description: An open-air museum showcasing traditional rural architecture from all regions of Romania—wooden churches, farmhouses, mills, and workshops set in leafy Herăstrău Park. Spend 1–2 hours strolling and photographing historic homesteads.

activities.name: Bucovina Painted Monasteries Tour
activities.description: Visit UNESCO-listed monasteries like Voroneț, Humor, Moldovița and Sucevița on a guided circuit from Suceava or Gura Humorului. See famed exterior frescoes—including the 'Voroneț blue'—and learn about Moldavian history and iconography.

activities.name: Bear Watching from a Hide (Brașov)
activities.description: Head into the forests near Brașov to observe wild brown bears from a secure hide with a ranger. Tours typically last 2–4 hours in late afternoon and run March–November. Silence and dark clothing recommended; sightings not guaranteed.

activities.name: Parc Aventura Brașov Zipline & Ropes
activities.description: Challenge yourself on multiple high-rope courses and long ziplines among tall pines by Lake Noua. Routes color-coded by difficulty suit families and thrill-seekers. Gloves provided; wear sporty clothing and closed shoes.

activities.name: Black Sea Sea-Kayaking (Mangalia)
activities.description: Paddle the Black Sea coastline near Mangalia on a guided sea-kayak outing. Learn basic strokes, launch through small surf, and explore coves depending on weather. Suitable for beginners in calm conditions; wind and swell dependent.

activities.name: Electronic Club Night in Bucharest
activities.description: Bounce between Bucharest's underground electronic hotspots for a late session of techno, house and indie sets. Expect strong sound systems, rotating international lineups and crowds that dance till sunrise. Dress casual-cool, grab tickets in advance for headline nights, or rock up early for entry.

activities.name: Cluj Live Music & Club Night
activities.description: Catch a headliner or DJ set in Cluj's buzzing venues. Start with a live show, then slide into an after-hours dance floor. The city's students and creatives keep the vibe energetic yet friendly, with events most weekends.

activities.name: Timisoara Club Night
activities.description: Dress sharp(ish) and dive into Timișoara's sleek club scene for chart, electronic and hip-hop nights. Bottle service available but not required; most venues run late with guest DJs most Fridays and Saturdays.

activities.name: Iași Night Out (Bars & Clubs)
activities.description: Sip cocktails in stylish lounges then hit a dance floor in one of Iași's clubs. Weekends bring themed parties, guest DJs and packed dance floors; weeknights skew chiller with live acts and cocktails.

activities.name: Bucharest Escape Room Challenge
activities.description: Race the clock with friends through cinematic sets and clever puzzles in Bucharest's largest escape venues. Choose difficulty and themes, book a private room, and celebrate your breakout with a drink nearby.

activities.name: Cluj Escape Room Adventure
activities.description: Tackle story-driven missions in Cluj with automated props and movie-set vibes. It's a teamwork workout with brainy challenges; great for small groups and corporate teams alike.

activities.name: Bucharest Yoga Class (Vinyasa/Hatha)
activities.description: Reset with an all-levels flow in central studios. Experienced instructors guide breathwork, alignment and gentle strength. Mats provided at most studios; book morning or evening sessions to suit your schedule.

activities.name: CrossFit Session in Cluj
activities.description: Power through a coached WOD focusing on functional strength, conditioning and mobility. Scaled movements welcome—perfect for travelers wanting a serious sweat and a supportive community.

activities.name: CrossFit Session in Bucharest
activities.description: Hit a high-intensity class with certified coaches, barbells and rigs. Visitors can drop into community WODs or book personal training to tune technique.

activities.name: Oradea Thermal Aqua Day (Aquaparks)
activities.description: Soak in mineral-rich pools, rotate steam/sauna circuits and hit slides if you want thrills. Family-friendly zones and adult relaxation areas make this a great wellness-plus-fun day in Oradea & Băile Felix.

activities.name: Sovata Bear Lake & Spa Day
activities.description: Float effortlessly in saline waters and alternate with saunas and Kneipp pools at Ensana Sovata. Classic balneary treatments are available alongside modern wellness programs.

activities.name: Balvanyos Forest Spa Ritual
activities.description: Hide away in a pine-ringed spa with outdoor hot tubs, thermal circuits and treatment rooms blending wood, stone, water and fire. Ideal for couples or a serene solo reset.

activities.name: Black Sea Coastal Kayaking Coaching
activities.description: Paddle along the Dobrogea coast with a certified sea-kayak coach. Learn strokes, safety and navigation as you explore cliffs and coves when conditions allow. All kit provided; sessions tailored to level.

activities.name: Wakeboarding Session near Bucharest
activities.description: Carve Snagov or a private lake on a coached wake set. Beginners get 1-to-1 instruction and safety gear; riders can push tricks with progressive coaching. Great summer adrenaline hit close to the city.

activities.name: Intro to Golf in Transylvania
activities.description: Learn grip, stance and swing on a driving range before testing short game on academy holes. Friendly coaches and calm countryside make this an approachable first step into golf.

activities.name: Romantic Boat Ride on Herăstrău Lake
activities.description: Glide past green isles and city skyline on a private or shared lake cruise. Golden-hour trips are perfect for proposals or a relaxed date; book the classic 'Lăstunul' boat or rent a rowboat/pedalo.

activities.name: Hot Air Balloon Flight near Cluj
activities.description: Lift off for a gentle flight over Transylvanian hills at sunrise or sunset. Share a basket as the pilot follows the winds; land for a celebratory toast and photos.

activities.name: Christmas Market Sibiu (Piața Mare)
activities.description: Wander one of Romania's most charming Christmas markets under twinkling lights. Sip vin fiert, browse crafts and ride the Ferris wheel and carousel. Perfect for families and cozy dates.

activities.name: Christmas Market Cluj-Napoca (Piața Unirii)
activities.description: A festive village in Union Square with local makers, carols and skating. Warm your hands on kürtőskalács and mulled wine between photo-ops at the big tree.

activities.name: Christmas Market Bucharest (Constitution Square)
activities.description: Big city atmosphere with stages, food alleys and artisan stalls in front of the Parliament. Visit evenings for light shows and live music.

activities.name: Christmas Market Timișoara (Victory Square)
activities.description: Wooden chalets, folk music and a Ferris wheel light up the center. Snack your way through local sweets and enjoy nightly performances.

activities.name: Bucharest Traditional Food Tour
activities.description: Taste sarmale, mici, covrigi, and sweet cozonac while exploring Old Town and historic markets with a local foodie guide. Learn dish origins, ordering etiquette, and how to pair Romanian beers and wines. Vegetarian alternatives usually available; small groups keep it personal.

activities.name: Romanian Cooking Class in Bucharest
activities.description: Chop, simmer, and season your own three-course Romanian meal—think ciorbă, sarmale, and papanasi—guided by a local chef. Hands-on instruction covers spice blends, plating, and stories behind classic dishes. Sit down to enjoy your creations with a glass of local wine.

activities.name: Cluj-Napoca Street Food & Market Tasting
activities.description: Sample Transylvanian cheeses, cured meats, chimney cake, and specialty coffee on a guided walk through Cluj's central squares and marketplace. Meet vendors, learn regional flavors, and pick up tips on ordering local favorites.

activities.name: Sibiu Old Town Food Tour
activities.description: Discover Saxon-influenced recipes on a curated tasting route: soups and stews, artisan bread, cured meats, and local desserts. Your guide shares culinary history and modern slow-food projects around Sibiu.

activities.name: Timișoara Craft Beer Tasting Crawl
activities.description: Explore Romania's craft scene with flights at two taprooms. Learn styles from NEIPA to barrel-aged stouts, how to read labels, and what pairs with local snacks. Perfect prelude to a night out.

activities.name: Gramma Winery Visit & Tasting (Iași)
activities.description: Drive into the Bârnova hills for a guided tasting of aromatic whites and blends. Stroll the vines, see the cellar, and learn about Moldavian terroir. Pair with local cheeses or snacks on request.

activities.name: Domeniul Bogdan Organic Winery Tour
activities.description: Visit an organic estate in Dobrogea near Constanța. Walk the vineyard, learn biodynamic practices, and taste award-winning wines in a modern cellar. Ideal summer day-trip from the coast.

activities.name: Dealu Mare Winery Trio (Lacerta/Serve/Budureasca)
activities.description: Spend a full day tasting across three flagship estates in Dealu Mare. Compare styles with a sommelier host, tour barrel rooms, and enjoy viewpoints over rolling hills. Transfers and lunch add-ons available.

activities.name: Constanța Seafood Tasting Experience
activities.description: Feast on Black Sea catch—fried hamsii, rapana, mussels—and Dobrogean specialties with seaside views. Learn what's in season, typical cooking methods, and recommended local wines.

activities.name: Improvisation Theatre Workshop (Bucharest)
activities.description: Loosen up with games that build listening, spontaneity, and storytelling. A professional improv coach guides warmups and short-form scenes—no experience needed. Great confidence builder and social icebreaker.

activities.name: Salsa/Bachata Beginner Class (Bucharest)
activities.description: Learn basic steps and partner connection in a friendly studio. Rotate partners, practice timing, and finish with a short social dance. Sneakers OK; no partner required.

activities.name: Cyanotype & Alternative Photography Workshop
activities.description: Create sun-printed blue images using vintage cyanotype chemistry. Compose botanicals or photo negatives, coat paper, expose, and wash to reveal unique prints. All materials provided.

activities.name: Screen Printing Basics (Bucharest)
activities.description: Design, burn a screen, and pull your first T-shirt or poster print under an artist's guidance. Learn inks, mesh counts, and registration tips, then take home your custom piece.

activities.name: Icon on Glass Workshop (ASTRA Museum)
activities.description: Discover a Transylvanian folk technique painting icons on glass. Trace motifs, apply colors in reverse, and seal your piece to take home. Hosted by craftspeople inside the open-air museum.

activities.name: Weaving on the Loom (ASTRA Museum)
activities.description: Try hand-weaving on a traditional loom, learning basic patterns and warp/weft setup. Friendly facilitators guide you through a small sample you can keep.

activities.name: Romanian Language Crash Course (Bucharest)
activities.description: Pick up essentials—greetings, numbers, food words, and travel phrases—in a fast-paced intro led by a certified teacher. Materials provided; small groups keep it interactive.

activities.name: Specialty Coffee Brewing Class (Bucharest)
activities.description: Dial in your pour-over and AeroPress with a barista trainer: grind size, ratios, and extraction. Practice on pro gear and taste differences across recipes and origins.

activities.name: Barista Basics Workshop (Cluj)
activities.description: Hands-on session covering espresso dialing, milk steaming, and latte art basics at a specialty roastery's training lab. Ideal for home enthusiasts and aspiring baristas.

activities.name: Sibiu Traditional Cooking Class
activities.description: Shop for seasonal ingredients then cook a traditional menu with a local chef. Learn techniques, plating, and regional stories before sharing the meal together.

activities.name: Intro to Romanian Wine (Bucharest)
activities.description: Taste through key Romanian grapes—Fetească Albă, Fetească Neagră, Tămâioasă—while learning wine structure, aroma wheels, and food pairing basics with a sommelier.

activities.name: Sound Bath & Breathwork (Bucharest)
activities.description: Slow down with a facilitator-led session using crystal bowls and gentle breath techniques to release stress and improve sleep. Mats and blankets provided; no experience needed.

activities.name: Halotherapy & Mindful Walk – Turda Salt Mine
activities.description: Descend into the otherworldly chambers of Salina Turda for clean, mineral-rich air. Stroll the galleries, sit in quiet corners for mindful breathing, and enjoy the subterranean lake views.

activities.name: Salt Mine Wellness Session – Praid
activities.description: Ride underground buses to vast chambers fitted with relaxation areas and playgrounds. Breathe deeply during a guided stretch or quiet meditation to benefit from the saline microclimate.

activities.name: Therme Sauna Rituals & Mindful Heat
activities.description: Join a curated series of sauna rituals (aufguss) with scented steam, guided breathing, and cool-down cycles to deepen relaxation. Rotate hot/cold exposure for a meditative reset.

activities.name: Ana Aslan Health Spa Day – Eforie Nord
activities.description: Rejuvenate with seawater pools, mud packs, and tailored therapies at a historic Black Sea balneary center. Combine beach time with a focused wellness session or package.

activities.name: Aqvatonic Med Spa Pass – Eforie Nord
activities.description: Follow a hydrotherapy circuit through underwater jets, cascades, and saunas at a dedicated med-spa by the sea. Family-friendly slots and adult-only times available.

activities.name: Leaota Mountain Horseback Trail Ride
activities.description: Ride calm, well-trained horses across forest tracks and alpine meadows with panoramic Leaota views. Guides match routes to ability; helmets provided. Great nature fix within reach of Bucharest.

activities.name: Bucegi Plateau Hike: Babele & Sphinx
activities.description: Ride the cable car then cross the wind-shaped plateau to the Babele huts and iconic Sphinx rock. A guide sets an easy pace, explains geology and legends, and manages weather calls.

activities.name: Scărișoara Ice Cave & Apuseni Views
activities.description: Head into Apuseni to visit one of the world's largest underground glaciers, then walk to viewpoints over karst valleys. Entrances are managed; guides handle timing and access.

activities.name: Cheile Turzii Gorge Guided Hike
activities.description: Follow a spectacular limestone gorge with suspension bridges and wildflower meadows. Your guide shares geology and local stories, with optional photo stops on scenic ledges.

activities.name: Retezat National Park Day Hike
activities.description: Tackle a classic trail past glacial lakes under jagged peaks in one of Romania's wildest parks. A licensed mountain guide sets pace and route, adjusting to group ability.

activities.name: Viscri Pastures Bike & Haystack Walk
activities.description: Pedal quiet lanes around UNESCO-listed Viscri, stopping for haystack views and village life. Option to switch to an easy pastoral walk if you prefer on-foot exploration.

activities.name: Board Game Night in Bucharest Old Town
activities.description: Grab a table, pick from hundreds of titles, and spend an evening learning new games with friendly locals. Staff help match groups and explain rules, so beginners feel welcome. It's a super social way to meet people and unwind after work in the lively streets of the Old Town.

activities.name: Pub Quiz Night in the Old Town (Mojo & The PUB)
activities.description: Test your knowledge in English-language quizzes with picture rounds, music, and prizes. Reserve a team table, enjoy pub grub and beers, and compete against expat and local teams. Fun, friendly rivalry in two centrally located venues with weekly schedules.

activities.name: Escape Room Marathon (Central Bucharest)
activities.description: Race the clock through immersive themed rooms—solve clues, open locks, and crack story-driven puzzles. Choose spooky, fantasy, or thriller scenarios. Great for small groups, team bonding, or date nights. Book back-to-back rooms to turn the challenge into a friendly tournament.

activities.name: Bucharest Language Exchange Social
activities.description: Practice languages with an international crowd at rotating city-centre bars. Color-coded stickers help match levels and interests. Hosts facilitate icebreakers so newcomers slip right in. A low-pressure way to make friends and keep your speaking skills sharp.

activities.name: NOR Sky Rooftop Dinner for Two
activities.description: Clink glasses 136 meters above the city at SkyTower's NOR Sky. Panoramic windows, creative Romanian-inspired dishes, and a moody skyline make it a memorable date night. Book a window table for sunset and linger over dessert as the city lights come on.

activities.name: Rooftop Cocktails at Linea/Closer to the Moon
activities.description: Sip signature cocktails under fairy lights at one of the city's most photogenic rooftops. The vibe is relaxed and stylish, with a busy weekend scene and seasonal pop-ups. Ideal for golden-hour photos and a cozy date above the Old Town bustle.

activities.name: Private Boat Ride on Herăstrău Lake
activities.description: Glide past leafy shores and landmark bridges on a private boat around Herăstrău. Choose a daytime spin or a golden-hour cruise with a bottle of bubbly. Calm waters, city-park scenery, and plenty of photo stops make it a relaxed, romantic escape.

activities.name: Private Snagov Lake Boat Cruise
activities.description: Escape the city for smooth waters and quiet bays on Snagov Lake. Private skippers tailor routes for sunset views, birdlife spotting, or a stop by Snagov Monastery. Add a picnic or prosecco for an elevated date-day vibe.

activities.name: Couples' Photoshoot in Old Town
activities.description: Stroll Lipscani's cobbles with a pro photographer who knows the best murals, courtyards, and golden-hour angles. You'll get edited images for your feed or a keepsake album—perfect after an engagement dinner or as a surprise gift.

activities.name: Edenland Park Zipline & Aerial Courses
activities.description: Tackle progressive aerial routes, giant ziplines, and add-ons like archery or paintball in a forest park just north of Bucharest. Helmets/harness included and staff brief you on safety. Great for families and groups; book weekends in advance.

activities.name: Comana Adventure Park & Kayak
activities.description: Spend a day in Comana Natural Park: tree-top courses, ziplines, boat or kayak in wetlands, and cycling paths. On-site eateries and shady areas make it a relaxed yet active escape. Ideal for mixed-ability groups and families.

activities.name: Tandem Skydiving at Clinceni Airfield
activities.description: Take the leap over Bucharest's outskirts with an experienced tandem instructor. Briefing, harness, and goggles provided; add photos or video at booking. Expect a scenic plane ride, one unforgettable minute of freefall, and a smooth canopy glide.

activities.name: Squash Session & Coaching (Central-East)
activities.description: Book a court or a coaching hour on modern WSF-spec courts. Great cardio, easy to learn, and super social in doubles or mini-tournaments. Equipment hire available; bring indoor shoes. Good for after-work sweat sessions.

activities.name: Badminton Courts & Group Play (Sun Plaza)
activities.description: Fast rallies, friendly ladders, and inclusive beginner training—Badminton Armada runs daily sessions beneath Sun Plaza. Reserve a court online or join coached groups. Rackets available to rent; wear non-marking shoes.

activities.name: Ice Skating Session (AFI Cotroceni)
activities.description: Lace up for open sessions at Bucharest's year-round mall rink. Rent skates on site, loop to upbeat tracks, or book a coaching lesson. Family-friendly with lockers and cafés nearby—great rainy-day cardio.

activities.name: Beginner Archery Class (Sector 5 Range)
activities.description: Learn stance, draw, and release with certified coaches at an indoor urban range. All equipment is provided, and classes suit ages 12+. A calm, focus-building sport that's surprisingly addictive and a great alternative workout.

activities.name: Karaoke Night at Mojo Music Club
activities.description: Grab a mic in Bucharest's Old Town and sing your heart out at Mojo—Romania's original seven-nights-a-week karaoke institution. Multiple bars, a big song catalog, and friendly hosts keep the energy high through late hours. Perfect for groups, meetups, and new friends in the city.

activities.name: Fun Bowling & Billiards at Trickshot
activities.description: Mix games, great music, and a lively crowd at Trickshot's glossy bowling lounges. Reserve lanes for teams, grab craft cocktails and snacks, and challenge friends at billiards and arcade cabinets. A quintessential social night out with easy online/phone booking.

activities.name: Free-Roam VR Arena & Escape Games (Gateway VR)
activities.description: Step into a free-roam VR arena and cooperative escape games at Gateway VR Studio. Battle zombies, crack Ubisoft-style VR puzzles, or race simulators. Staff guide first-timers, making it perfect for groups, team socials, and birthdays.

activities.name: Immersive Escape Room Adventure
activities.description: Race the clock as a team inside cinematic sets. Choose themes from Indiana Jones to horror at top venues; expect tactile puzzles, hidden mechanisms, and great set design. Ideal for friends or coworkers looking for a shared triumph.

activities.name: Romantic Candlelight Concert (Fever)
activities.description: Hundreds of candles, intimate venues, and string quartets covering classical and modern hits. Candlelight events pop up around Bucharest's most atmospheric halls—perfect for a date night with effortless booking and assigned seating.

activities.name: Stargazing at Vasile Urseanu Observatory
activities.description: Peer through telescopes on guided public nights at Bucharest's historic observatory. Staff point out planets, double stars, and seasonal constellations, with occasional rooftop views and exhibits. A quiet, inspiring date option in the city.

activities.name: Boat Ride on Herăstrău Lake
activities.description: Glide across Herăstrău Lake by rowboat, pedalo, or join a mini-cruise. Central docks operate spring–autumn with simple on-site tickets—sunset sessions are especially scenic. A relaxed, wallet-friendly date or friends' hangout.

activities.name: Go-Karting: VMAX (Indoor) or AMCKart (Outdoor)
activities.description: Chase lap times on Bucharest's most popular tracks. Indoors, VMAX Romexpo runs torquey electric karts on a multi-level track; outdoors, AMCKart Tunari offers long straights and night sessions. Arrive & drive or book events for groups.

activities.name: Indoor Climbing Session (Top-rope & Bouldering)
activities.description: Learn knots, belay, and movement on varied walls with rental gear available. Suitable for first-timers or training sessions, with intro classes and auto-belays at leading gyms. Great cross-training and a social way to get active.

activities.name: Laser Tag Battles
activities.description: Fast-paced team matches with vests, scoreboards, and neon mazes. Ideal for office outings or birthdays; most venues offer private games, party rooms, and simple per-session pricing.

activities.name: Padel Court Booking (Romexpo Area)
activities.description: Book doubles at modern indoor/outdoor padel courts near Romexpo. Rackets and balls are rentable; many clubs run beginner socials, ladders, and coaching. Easy to reach from the north side business district.

activities.name: 5-a-Side Football Pitch Hire (South)
activities.description: Round up friends and rent a FIFA-sized 5-a-side pitch with lights and quality turf in the city's south. Book recurring slots, add changing rooms, and optionally hire a referee for mini-leagues.

venues.name: Therme București – Galaxy
venues.blurb: Family zone with wave pool and slides; ideal for kids, with food courts and loungers.

venues.name: Therme București – The Palm & Elysium
venues.blurb: Adults-only wellness areas with mineral pools, themed saunas, Aufguss rituals and spa treatments.

venues.name: Peleș Castle – Official Museum
venues.blurb: Neo-Renaissance royal residence with ornate interiors; guided tours in multiple languages.

venues.name: Pelișor Castle (Annex Museum)
venues.blurb: Art Nouveau residence of Queen Marie; smaller but richly decorated interiors.

venues.name: Bran Castle – Official
venues.blurb: Medieval hilltop fortress linked to the Dracula legend; exhibits on Queen Marie.

venues.name: Walkabout Free Tours – Brașov
venues.blurb: Daily tip-based walking tours led by licensed local guides covering Brașov's medieval core.

venues.name: Tour Guide Brașov (Private Guide)
venues.blurb: Authorized local guide offering customizable city and castle day tours.

venues.name: R&J Ski School Poiana Brașov
venues.blurb: Established ski & snowboard school with rentals and private/group lessons near main lifts.

venues.name: Interski Romania – Poiana Brașov
venues.blurb: Kids and adult lessons with certified instructors; rentals and convenient base near slopes.

venues.name: Discover Danube Delta – Tulcea Office
venues.blurb: Licensed operator offering small-boat wildlife trips, photo tours and multi-day programs.

venues.name: SAFCA Delta Tours
venues.blurb: Group and private Danube Delta tours with daily departures Apr–Sep; local skippers.

venues.name: Lacerta Winery – Visits & Tasting
venues.blurb: Modern hillside winery with panoramic terrace; guided tastings by appointment.

venues.name: Budureasca Winery – Visitor Centre
venues.blurb: Large estate with guided cellar tours and tasting flights; shop on site.

venues.name: SERVE – Ceptura Winery
venues.blurb: Historic boutique winery; tastings by reservation focusing on premium blends.

venues.name: Salina Turda – Main Entrance
venues.blurb: Underground park with boat lake, Ferris wheel and exhibits—family-friendly and unique.

venues.name: National Village Museum – Ticket Office
venues.blurb: Open-air village showcasing authentic houses, churches and workshops from across Romania.

venues.name: Hello Bucovina Travel & Tours
venues.blurb: Licensed operator for daily and private Bucovina monastery circuits from Suceava.

venues.name: Voroneț Monastery (stop)
venues.blurb: UNESCO-listed monastery famed for the intense 'Voroneț blue' exterior frescoes.

venues.name: BearWatching.ro (Brasov)
venues.blurb: Short trips to ranger-managed hides near Brașov for ethical bear observation.

venues.name: Transylvanian Wolf – Wildlife Tours
venues.blurb: Local wildlife specialists offering bear-hide evenings and nature walks around Piatra Craiului.

venues.name: Parc Aventura Brașov
venues.blurb: Multiple rope courses and ziplines over the lake; gloves and gear included.

venues.name: Black Sea Paddlers
venues.blurb: Sea-kayak tours and training along the southern coast; safety gear and boats provided.

venues.name: Bucharest Pub Crawl (GetYourGuide meeting point)
venues.blurb: Hosted crawl through 3–4 bars with shots and club entry; guides coordinate venues based on the night.

venues.name: Cluj Pub Crawl (GetYourGuide check-in)
venues.blurb: Guide-led crawl to busy student bars and a club; drink deals and games included.

venues.name: Green Hours Jazz & Theatre Café
venues.blurb: Bucharest's original jazz courtyard with ticketed concerts and intimate jam sessions.

venues.name: The Jazz Club (JazzBook)
venues.blurb: Cozy living-room vibe with local quartets, singer–songwriters and themed tribute nights.

venues.name: Central Park (Chios / Ethnographic Park stages)
venues.blurb: Open-air stages across the park; family areas and workshops alongside concerts.

venues.name: Domeniile Budureasca
venues.blurb: Large cellar with barrel rooms and guided tastings; boutique shop on site.

venues.name: S.E.R.V.E. Ceptura
venues.blurb: Pioneer quality estate; guided tastings of Cuvée lines with sommelier notes.

venues.name: Paint & Party Studio (Universitate)
venues.blurb: Guided paint nights with all materials and a bar; fun, beginner-friendly atmosphere.

venues.name: Art & Hobby Studio
venues.blurb: Workshops in painting, calligraphy and crafts; occasional wine & paint evenings.

venues.name: Art & Hobby Studio – Ceramics
venues.blurb: Clay hand-building and glazing workshops; pieces fired and collected on a later date.

venues.name: PadelMania Pipera
venues.blurb: Indoor/outdoor padel venue with coaching and rentals; lively social scene.

venues.name: Peak Padel Cluj (Florești)
venues.blurb: Modern covered courts with coaching programs and racquet rentals.

venues.name: Stejarii Country Club – Tennis
venues.blurb: Premium clay and hard courts with certified coaches; guest access by prior arrangement.

venues.name: Nemo Diving Center (Eforie Nord)
venues.blurb: Intro dives and courses with boat or shore entries; full kit supplied.

venues.name: ScubaZone Constanța (Dive Center)
venues.blurb: Try-dives and PADI/CMAS training; weekend boat trips to reefs and wrecks.

venues.name: SetSail Sailing School (Constanța Marina)
venues.blurb: Weekend beginner courses and skipper training on keelboats; classroom + on-water.

venues.name: Guided Photo Walk – Cluj Old Town
venues.blurb: Hands-on composition and manual-mode coaching while exploring historic squares and side streets.

venues.name: Old Town Meeting Point (Lipscani)
venues.blurb: Central meet for small-group food walks through markets and eateries.

venues.name: Caru' cu Bere
venues.blurb: Iconic beer hall serving classic Romanian dishes—often a featured tasting stop.

venues.name: Chef's Home Studio (central)
venues.blurb: Hands-on class culminating in a shared dinner; wine included on many dates.

venues.name: Ana Health Spa – Hotel Europa
venues.blurb: Sea-view balneary center with mud treatments, hydrotherapy and massage.

venues.name: Aqvatonic Med Spa – Steaua de Mare
venues.blurb: Heated hydrotherapy circuit, jets and saunas—book day access or treatments.

venues.name: Potcoava Mountain Hideout
venues.blurb: Ranch specialising in trail rides and clinics; helmets and matching included.

venues.name: Telecabina Bușteni (Cable Car)
venues.blurb: Access to the Bucegi plateau; service depends on wind and weather.

venues.name: Apuseni Experience (guide office)
venues.blurb: Licensed guides for Scărișoara and Apuseni trails; transport options.

venues.name: Cheile Turzii Visitor Centre
venues.blurb: Entry ticketing and trail maps; local guides for hire.

venues.name: Viscri 125 Guesthouse (bike rental)
venues.blurb: Bike rentals and guided tours around the village and countryside.

venues.name: Bucharest Geek Hub
venues.blurb: Cozy board-game café with a deep library, staff recommendations, and regular social nights in the heart of the Old Town.

venues.name: Snakes & Wizards Board Game Café
venues.blurb: Friendly board-game space with snacks, themed nights, and lots of modern strategy titles; great for mixed-level groups.

venues.name: Mojo Music Club
venues.blurb: Legendary Old Town multi-level venue hosting the Big British Bucharest Quiz plus live bands and karaoke through the week.

venues.name: The PUB Universității
venues.blurb: Tap-your-own-beer tables, live music and weekly events; book a team table for themed quiz nights at Km 0.

venues.name: The Void Escape Room
venues.blurb: Immersive rooms (Coven, Madhouse, Tahicardia) with strong theming and tech; teams of 2–7; English-friendly staff.

venues.name: Inside Rooms
venues.blurb: Three varied games with creative puzzles; 60–90 minute scenarios; close to Piața Unirii; English instructions available.

venues.name: NOR Sky Casual Restaurant
venues.blurb: Panoramic dining at the top of SkyTower with window tables for sunset views; refined Romanian-inspired menu.

venues.name: LINEA/Closer to the Moon
venues.blurb: Stylish rooftop with creative cocktails, photo-friendly décor and seasonal pop-ups; popular for golden-hour dates.

venues.name: LaȘtunul Boats – Herăstrău Park
venues.blurb: Rowboats and small electric boats for private laps around the lake; pay-by-time with optional extras.

venues.name: Snagov Club Boats
venues.blurb: Private skipper-led cruises; add sparkling wine or picnics; easy access from Bucharest (c. 40–60 min).

venues.name: Edenland Park
venues.blurb: Big forest adventure park with ziplines, aerial circuits, archery, paintball and cafés; close to city.

venues.name: Parc Aventura Comana
venues.blurb: Treetop routes, zipline and boats in a nature park; food stalls and shaded rest areas for families.

venues.name: TNT Brothers – Clinceni DZ
venues.blurb: Tandem skydives with video add-ons; modern aircraft; dropzone shop on site; weekends book up fast.

venues.name: Squash4All
venues.blurb: Five WSF-spec courts, coaching, and equipment rental; convenient for after-work play; online booking.

venues.name: Badminton Armada (Elite Performance Center)
venues.blurb: Daily coached groups and open courts; easy online booking; rackets available; friendly club culture.

venues.name: Cotroceni on Ice (AFI Mall)
venues.blurb: Year-round indoor rink with rental skates, themed sessions and lessons; perfect rainy-day activity in AFI mall.

venues.name: White Tiger Archery
venues.blurb: Indoor range with beginner courses and equipment included; small-group coaching in English available on request.

venues.name: White Tiger Archery
venues.blurb: Indoor range with beginner courses and equipment included; small-group coaching in English available on request.

venues.name: Mojo Music Club
venues.blurb: Legendary Old Town spot with karaoke seven nights a week, live bands, sports screens, and late closing—perfect for big social nights.

venues.name: Trickshot Promenada
venues.blurb: Sleek lanes, billiards and arcade games with a lively crowd, cocktails and a full kitchen—book lanes ahead for peak times.

venues.name: Trickshot Mega Mall
venues.blurb: Bowling, billiards and arcade games under one roof with a restaurant vibe—good for big groups and birthdays.

venues.name: Gateway VR Studio
venues.blurb: Free-roam VR arenas, escape games and racing sims with hosts to guide newcomers; ideal for team events.

venues.name: Escape Arena
venues.blurb: Big, cinematic rooms (e.g., Indiana Jones) with 75-minute sessions; English-friendly staff.

venues.name: The Void Escape Room
venues.blurb: Award-nominated escape rooms like Tahicardia and Coven with strong storytelling and immersive tech.

venues.name: Candlelight Concerts (various venues)
venues.blurb: Intimate, candlelit performances across the city's prettiest halls; reserve seats directly in the app.

venues.name: Observatorul Astronomic Amiral Vasile Urseanu
venues.blurb: Public observation nights with telescopes and exhibitions; low-key, atmospheric date.

venues.name: Debarcader Central Herăstrău (ALPAB)
venues.address: Parcul Regele Mihai I – Debarcader Central
venues.blurb: Rowboats, pedalos, and lake mini-cruises; pay-as-you-go with posted tariffs; easy date idea.

venues.name: VMAX Karting Romexpo
venues.blurb: Multi-level indoor electric karting with live timing and lounge; arrive & drive or events.

venues.name: AMCKart Tunari
venues.blurb: 1.24-km outdoor circuit with multiple kart classes and night lighting; gear available on site.

venues.name: Vertical Spirit (Baicului)
venues.blurb: Big routes, auto-belays and classes; rental gear on site—great for beginners and training.

venues.name: LaserMaxx (Vitan/Unirii)
venues.blurb: Neon maze arena with vests and real-time scoring; group packages and unlimited-play deals mid-week.

venues.name: Laser Megazone (Titan Park)
venues.blurb: Popular arena near Titan Park; glow-lit labyrinth and session packages for groups and parties.

venues.name: PadelX Romexpo Courts
venues.blurb: Modern padel club with multiple courts, socials and coaching; rent rackets/balls when you book.

venues.name: ARGMAN Football Complex
venues.blurb: Multiple quality turf pitches with lights and changing rooms; book recurring evening slots for leagues.
